```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, eval = FALSE)
library(polypharmacy)
```

## Installer dernière version
```{r}
if (!"remotes" %in% installed.packages()[, 1])
  install.packages("remotes")

remotes::install_github("guiboucher/polypharmacy",
                        auth_token = "1dc962fa44a6530bad526a90912e4f4082cc174b",
                        build = TRUE)
```

## Tables disponibles

Tables créées par Houssem.

### Séparation des molécules actives
```{r}
# library(polypharmacy)
nom_tableau1 <- polypharmacy:::drug_bkdn1
```
```{r, echo=FALSE}
head(polypharmacy:::drug_bkdn1)
```

### Durées constantes
```{r}
# library(polypharmacy)
nom_tableau2 <- polypharmacy:::cst_deliv_duration1
```
```{r, echo=FALSE}
head(polypharmacy:::cst_deliv_duration1)
```
